00048 class PxOutputStream;
00049 class PxBinaryConverter;
00050 
00051 struct PxPlatform
00052 {
00053     enum Enum
00054     {
00055         ePC,
00056         eXENON,
00057         ePLAYSTATION3,
00058         eWII,
00059         eARM,
00060     };
00061 };
00062 
00069 struct PxCookingParams
00070 {
00080     PxPlatform::Enum    targetPlatform;
00081 
00092     float       skinWidth;
00093 
00100     bool        suppressTriangleMeshRemapTable;
00101 
00108     bool        buildTriangleAdjacencies;
00109 
00110     PxCookingParams():
00111         skinWidth(0.025f),
00112         suppressTriangleMeshRemapTable(false),
00113         buildTriangleAdjacencies(false)
00114     {
00115 #if defined(PX_X86) || defined(PX_X64)
00116         targetPlatform = PxPlatform::ePC;
00117 #elif defined(PX_X360)
00118         targetPlatform = PxPlatform::eXENON;
00119 #elif defined(PX_PS3)
00120         targetPlatform = PxPlatform::ePLAYSTATION3;
00121 #elif defined(PX_WII)
00122         targetPlatform = PxPlatform::eWII;
00123 #elif defined(PX_ARM)
00124         targetPlatform = PxPlatform::eARM;
00125 #else
00126 #error Unknown platform
00127 #endif
00128     }   
00129 };
00130 
00131 class PxCooking
00132 {
00133 public:
00137     virtual void  release() = 0;
00138 
00146     virtual void  setParams(const PxCookingParams& params) = 0;
00147 
00155     virtual const PxCookingParams& getParams() = 0;
00156 
00162     virtual bool  platformMismatch() = 0;
00163 
00183     virtual bool  cookTriangleMesh(const PxTriangleMeshDesc& desc, PxOutputStream& stream) = 0;
00184 
00209     virtual bool  cookConvexMesh(const PxConvexMeshDesc& desc, PxOutputStream& stream) = 0;
00210 
00220     virtual bool  cookClothFabric(const PxClothMeshDesc& desc, const PxVec3& gravityDir, PxOutputStream& stream) = 0;
00221 
00229     virtual PxBinaryConverter*  createBinaryConverter(physx::PxErrorCallback* error=NULL)   = 0;
00230 
00231 protected:
00232     virtual ~PxCooking(){}
00233 };
